snippet.title: Gameplay Trailer | The Brew Barons
snippet.description:
Follow us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lifetapstudios/the-brew-barons
We're pleased to present our very first trailer from our brand new indie studio startup! The Brew Barons : A tranquil world becomes ever more corrupt by the day, spoiled by a pirate organization that forcefully impose their brewing monopoly over the lands. It's up to you to explore, forage, craft, sell and deliver your brews to overthrow the corrupt pirate organization and restore peace and balance to the islands. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1636710/The_Brew_Barons/
https://twitter.com/LifetapStudios
https://discord.gg/5GYzaFbzEu

#Ghibli #PorcoRosso #IndieGames #TheBrewBarons
